summary: Starship One - the most powerful warship in the Federation, capable of destroying entire worlds. When the order is given to destroy the Earth, Flight Lieutenant John Worthy mutineers Starship One and takes on the might of the Federation.
cast: Darren Jacobs|Emii|Brooke Lewis Bellas|Claudia Wells|E.J. De la Pena|Ralph Guzzo|Rajia Baroudi|Marilyn Ghigliotti|Christina Moses|Lynn Ayala|Breck Gallini|Christian Anderson|Joshua Paul Miller|Neil Johnson|John Alton|Mikel Arvizu|Brad Bishop|Daniel Bridges|Billy Burns|Kathi Carey|Catharina Christie|D. Alan Cooksey|Fiona Domenica|Cliff Greenough|Reece Haile|Ty Haile|Aaron Jacques|Noel Kachaturian|Morgan Lariah|Eva-Maria Leonardou|Maria Luna|Michael Scott Martin|Myke Michaels|Tony Nevada|Tom Riordan|Grace Roubidoux|Haley Sims|Lara Taillon|Kaleti Williams
title: Starship: Rising
